attributes.action: Use more renewable energy sources to power businesses, homes and transport
attributes.background: Using more renewable energy will improve the air and overtime will be cheaper. This will improve health in the uk meaning less money on health care and taxes will eventually reduce, creating economic developments and jobs in manufacturing and installing.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take to increase renewable energy sources.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231243
